com.chaione.contexthub.sdk

Class LocationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chaione.contexthub.sdk.LocationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    retrofit.Callback<List<Geofence>>

    public class LocationService
extends Object
implements retrofit.Callback<List<Geofence>>
    This service tracks the user's location and monitors the geofence activities

        public void synchronize()
        Setup/refresh location and geofence monitoring. Typically called on initial location client connect or if geofences are manually added and background push notifications are not setup.
